featured.title: God's Website
featured.description: Finally Helps us track what we say about God right now. Can it help us, the other way around, too?

featured.title: Life in Review
featured.description: A stream of digital memories flashes before your physical eyes.

featured.title: David Zwirnher Online
featured.description: Fall through a hole of every Instagram image ever tagged at David Zwirner's NYC Gallery.

featured.title: Chromatic Deduction
featured.description: Films detached from their natural temporal order and reconfigured into various color-sorted alt-temporal orders.

featured.title: Second Round Square Solo
featured.description: A video permutation piece about language where 13 poems, ascending from in length from three to fifteen lines, are mechanically read in every possible permutated line-order.

other.title: MAX AND ROLL
other.description: Carmichael's first album. Not just an album, a Visual Software Classic Rock MIDI Album incorporating videos of friend Max playing the piano. In 2D and 3D!

other.title: FACE TIME
other.description: Facial Aspect Character Emulator with Timed Intuitive Muscular Expression. Live facial deformation / enhancement suite.

other.title: Max Plays Mozart | Paganini's Caprice 5
other.description: Max Plays Mozart is software that plays midi songs as a series of videos of our friend Max playing the piano. This is a song inspired by Cory Arcangel's similar guitar video.

other.title: Multiplex Cinema
other.description: A collection of films that have been rescrambled to exercise and stretch the multitasking-oriented part of your mind, from A1A2A3B1B2B3C1C2C3 To A1B1C1A2B2C2A3B3C3: for us.

other.title: Chromatic Reduction
other.description: A spectrum of films rendered as ColorStreams, where each frame is monochromatically reduced to its most relevant color.

other.title: fffight.site
other.description: 126 dynamically composed permutations of reconstructed action scenes from the Bourne series; the natural evolution of Bourne rebourne.

other.title: Bourne rebourne
other.description: A collection of films that rip apart action shots from the Bourne series and reconstruct them with Strength, Speed, and Vigor.

other.title: feud.online
other.description: A series of continuous films about the family, spectacle, and endless repetition.

other.title: Rain in a Room
other.description: Explore a digital interpretation of Random International's infamous rain room.
